citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1:30-2:00pm on 18
April 2023. Arrived at facility 001 and called licensee phone numbers, left messages at both numbers, sent text message
and left contact card with phone number at both facilities. No response within 30 minutes, so left facilities.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b)  Repeat
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1:30-2:00pm on 18 
April 2023.  Arrived at facility 001 and called licensee phone numbers, left messages at both numbers, sent text message 
and left contact card with phone number at both facilities.  No response within 30 minutes, so left facilities. 
 
 
 
End Section
